verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: the FBI implanted an informant in his campaign] , and in a tweet Sunday , he demanded that the Justice Department investigate whether that actually happened.</p >

< p > President Trump says [ARG0: the FBI] [V: implanted] [ARG1: an informant] [ARG2: in his campaign] , and in a tweet Sunday , he demanded that the Justice Department investigate whether that actually happened.</p >

< p > President Trump says the FBI implanted an informant in his campaign , and [ARGM-LOC: in a tweet] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] , [ARG0: he] [V: demanded] [ARG1: that the Justice Department investigate whether that actually] happened.</p >

< p > President Trump says the FBI implanted an informant in his campaign , and in a tweet Sunday , he demanded that the Justice Department investigate whether [ARG1: that] [ARGM-ADV: actually] [V: happened.</p] >
